questions.quote: All right I'll talk to her. If you want to be a ball man go ahead, break the ball barrier.  Hey.
Daddy, there's, um, there's something that we have to talk to you about..
"This holiday season a donation has been made in your name to the Children's Alliance."?
Jerry, he is your butler. You can give him any order you want. That's what butlers do.
No breaks. I fell reborn, I'm like a Phoenix rising from Arizona.
"Well women do it." I'll tell you what. I'll pick you up a sundress and a parasol and you can just  sashey your pretty little self around the town square.
Two hours later he checks into Smither's clinic. I talked to the doctor yesterday. He's doing great on the rehab. He's hooked on Pez. He's eating them like there's no tomorrow.
Oh, hey, uh, listen, Jerry, uh, laundry's pilin' up there. You might want to tell your girlfriend. Mmm. Yeah.
Well, I got the tools. I got the pillows. All I need is the lumber.
Well, I don't know... h- how long have you been shaving your head for?
